attributes.action: Petition to challenge gender-discrimination in the words of The English Language
attributes.additional_details: Wan & man, is more equal than woman & man; woman evokes that women (wen) are offshoots of men, whereas: wan evokes that women (wen) are equal to men; wale & male is more equal than female & male; female, like woman, evokes that women (wen) are inferior to, or offshoots of men; humwan is more equal than human; human evokes that all homosapians are male, half aren’t male, half are female (wale).
attributes.background: For Gender equality & Scientific integrity; wan is to man, as wale is to male; humwan is to human, as humwanity is to humanity
